title: Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds are seen for the first time since birth of third baby

Blake Lively and her beau Ryan Reynolds were spotted in public for the first time since welcoming their third child earlier this month.

They appeared to finally be enjoying some adult time together since Blake gave birth to their daughter - whose name has been kept a secret.

The happy couple were seen on Tuesday making their way home from brunch in New York City.

Blake, 32, was dressed in a cosy long coat with a black and white gingham scarf draped around her neck as she wrapped up for the colder months.

She dressed her cosy outfit with a pair of black leggings and white trainers, finishing her look with a chunky knit olive beanie that covered her hair.

The pair looked loved-up as they linked arms while crossing the street to their apartment in a bid to escape the New York autumn air.

Meanwhile Ryan, 43, kept warm in a puffy body warmer layered over several jumpers, paired with slim grey slacks and white sneakers.

(Image: DIGGZY / SplashNews.com)

(Image: DIGGZY / SplashNews.com)

But parents-of-three Blake and Ryan want to protect their daughter's identity, as Ryan shared a snap of the first family photo on Twitter which read: "I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in."

(Image: DIGGZY / SplashNews.com)

(Image: DIGGZY / SplashNews.com)

They are already parents to daughters Inez, 3, and James, 4, and Lively and Reynolds tied the knot in 2012.

A source told PEOPLE : "They are so happy and excited about having another baby.

(Image: DIGGZY / SplashNews.com)

"They really are the most in-love and in-tune couple, and very hands-on parents. They'd have a dozen kids if they could."

Blake has previously gushed about creating a family with her husband, as she told Allure in 2012: "I've always wanted a big family. Oh, I'd love 30 [children] if I could."
description: Actress Blake Lively and her hubby Ryan Reynolds were spotted coming back from brunch after welcoming their third child earlier this month
